title: 7 standout moments from Live Lounge Month 2019
text:
Last November, Lewis Capaldi – still a relative newcomer at the time – made his Live Lounge debut as part of Live Lounge Month 2018. Little did any of us know that a few months later, he’d be playing chart-topping songs to a sold-out crowd in Liverpool alongside an orchestra, in the closing performance for Live Lounge Month 2019.

It’s been a stunning rise to stardom that’s taken the man himself by surprise, but that’s not to diminish how brilliant the likes of ‘Someone You Loved’ and ‘Hold Me While You Wait’ really are.

His spectacular show, performed with the Manchester Camerata Orchestra, was the perfect crowning moment of a whirlwind summer.
description: Orchestras, mash-up covers, spinny chairs – Live Lounge Month 2019 had everything.
